name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Itachi Uchiha: Mystery and Power in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into the world of Itachi Uchiha with mesmerizing visuals and smooth shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the world of Itachi Uchiha with stunning visuals, showcasing his power, grace, and iconic Sharingan.

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek, dark interface that reflects Itachi's calm and powerful presence, enhancing your browsing experience.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time with a stylish clock that complements the Itachi Uchiha theme.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Instantly access your favorite websites with easy-to-use shortcuts.
🎮 Play Games: Access exciting games directly from your browser, adding entertainment to your experience.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Search efficiently using your preferred search engine with the built-in search bar.
🚀 More Extension: Enhance your browsing with Uchiha Clan-inspired features and additional personalization options.
